block.p: 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. condo in a 94-year-old building; oversize windows, 12-ft. ceilings, marble bath, fireplace, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $694, taxes $4,956; listed at $599,000 (multiple bids), 9 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group; Douglas Elliman)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. condo in a 94-year-old building; oversize windows, 12-ft. ceilings, marble bath, fireplace, washer/dryer in unit; common charge $694, taxes $4,956; listed at $599,000 (multiple bids), 9 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group; Douglas Elliman)

1-bedroom, 1-bath, 850-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, hardwood floors, terrace, 3 exposures; maintenance $931, 48% tax-deductible; listed at $425,000, 13 weeks on market (brokers: Beth Chase Real Estate; Eychner Associates)

3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 2,762-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining room, renovated kitchen and baths, high ceilings, hardwood floors, exercise room; common charge $2,120, taxes $27,024; listed at $3.384 million, 24 weeks on market (brokers: Sunshine Group; Douglas Elliman)

2-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 1,489-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, Central Park view, health club and pool in building; common charge $1,450, taxes $12,000; listed at $1.3 million, 1 week on market (brokers: Sumitomo Real Estate; Fox Residential)

1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,086-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, dining area, windowed kitchen, washer/dryer, 2 exposures, health club and pool in building; common charge $708, taxes $3,144; listed at $625,000, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

3-bedroom, 2-bath, 3-story brownstone; dining room, eat-in kitchen, double parlor, pocket doors, original moldings and detail; 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,900; listed at $675,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Bridge Realty)

2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,000-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; large kitchen, hardwood floors, original moldings and detail, common roof deck with Manhattan skyline views; maintenance $1,064, 31% tax-deductible; listed at $450,000, 1 week on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

3-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. co-op in a 4-story brick building; dining room, study, hardwood floors, fireplace, washer/dryer, common roof deck, Manhattan skyline view; listed at $419,000, 1 week on market (broker: Betancourt & Associates Realty)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 80-year-old detached colonial style; dining room, eat-in kitchen, sun room, 2 fireplaces, 2-car garage, 50-by-123-ft. lot; taxes $3,300; listed at $575,000, 1 week on market (broker: ReMax/F. H. Realty)

4-bedroom, 3-bath, 39-year-old colonial-style split-level; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, exercise room, sitting room, rear deck, 2 fireplaces, marble bath with whirlpool tub, 2-car garage, 0.41-acre lot; taxes $13,216; listed at $875,000, 7 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Country Properties; Houlihan Lawrence)

5-bedroom, 1-year-old colonial style; 4 full and 2 half baths, dining room, kitchen with pantry, family room, 2 fireplaces, vaulted ceilings, whirlpool bath, 3-car garage, 3.6-acre lot; taxes $10,000; listed at $1.289 million, 13 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)

5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 85-year-old colonial style; dining room, den, screened porch, fireplace, 2-car garage, 0.46-acre fenced-in yard; taxes $10,651; listed at $695,000, 9 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/ Stamford and Greenwich)
